p: In Justice Court, Pierce County Washington Territory, before W. H. Harris Justice of the Peace.
Territory of Washington vs Jim (a Chinaman)
To W. H. Harris, Esqr: Justice of the Peace in and for Pierce County, Washington Territory.

You will please take notice that the defendant, Jim, in the above entitled cause, hereby appeals to the District Court, from the Judgment and decision rendered by you against him on the 18th day of August 1884, in the above entitled cause.
